patthana19.1:7.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:7.2: Akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:7.5: Vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:8.1: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:8.2: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:8.3: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:9.1: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:9.2: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:9.3: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:9.4: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:9.5: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:10.1: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:10.2: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:10.3: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:11.1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:11.2: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:11.3: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:12.1: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.1:13.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana19.1:13.2: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:14.1: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana19.1:14.2: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:15.1: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana19.1:15.2: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:16.1: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.1:17.1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.1:18.1: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana19.1:19.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.1:22.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:22.2: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … pe … nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:23.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … pe … nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana19.1:24.1: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa … pe … napurejāte dvādasa … pe … nakamme nava … pe … naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge tīṇi … pe … navippayutte nava … pe … novigate cha.
patthana19.1:29.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:29.2: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:29.3: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:29.4: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana19.1:29.5: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:30.1: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:31.1: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:33.3: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:34.1: Hetuyā chabbīsati, ārammaṇe terasa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate chabbīsati.
patthana19.1:35.1: Saṃsaṭṭhavāre hetuyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana19.1:38.1: Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:38.2: Nakusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:38.3: Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:39.1: Naakusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:40.1: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana19.1:41.1: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:42.1: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:43.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … ekaṃ.
patthana19.1:45.1: Nakusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:46.1: Naakusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:47.1: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:48.1: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:48.2: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:48.3: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:49.1: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:49.2: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana19.1:49.3: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:50.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:51.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare soḷasa … pe … sahajāte aṭṭhārasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye bāvīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte nava, pacchājāte cha, āsevane nava, kamme aṭṭhārasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre … pe … magge aṭṭhārasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa … pe … avigate dvāvīsa.
